data.name: Ultimate Packaged Home Loan - Fixed 4 Year Interest Only Owner Occupied
data.description: Packaged home loan, with multiple features for one annual fee

bundles.name: Ultimate Package
bundles.description: A single annual fee covering home loan and other services free of charge
bundles.additionalInfo: An Ultimate package includes, for an annual package fee of $395, at least one Ultimate Housing loan or Ultimate Line of Credit facility and any/ all of the optional products such Ultimate Offset, Credit card (Annual fee waived), no Establishment fees nor loan conversion fees on Ultimate products. Credit approval and account linkage conditions apply.

features.additionalInfo: Fee free redraw via Online Banking.  $30 fee for over the counter redraw.
Receive notification from bank of your nominated transactions (e.g. low account balance warning; credits over $500)

eligibility.additionalInfo: Must be identifiable in terms of legislative requirements. Lending criteria apply.

fees.name: Information fee - Search
fees.additionalInfo: $20.00 plus $1.00 per page

fees.name: Information fee - Per Page
fees.additionalInfo: $20.00 plus $1.00 per page

fees.name: SMS alert fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged for each SMS alert that is sent to you notifying you of account balances and/or other nominated transactions.

fees.name: Redraw over-the-counter fee
fees.additionalInfo: Each time you re-borrow money by making written application to any branch of Greater Bank Ltd.

fees.name: Redraw online banking fee
fees.additionalInfo: Online redraw transactions do not attract a fee.

fees.name: Establishment fee
fees.additionalInfo: $500.00 based on one security plus $250.00 for each additional security.  For each additional amount approved during the loan term, $350.00 based on one security plus $250.00 for each additional security.

fees.name: Administration fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when we consent to any subdivision, lease, discharge, partial discharge, change of name, release of a Security, changing a policy of lenders mortgage insurance, creation of subsequent Security Interest or any dealing in relation to a Security.

fees.name: Break costs
fees.additionalInfo: A break cost fee will be charged if we estimate we will make an economic loss as a result of the payout or a break from the fixed term

fees.name: Conversion fee - Switch to a Basic/Great Rate or Ultimate Home Loan
fees.additionalInfo: $500 fee payable when you ask us to switch your loan to a Basic/Great Rate or Ultimate Home Loan. If more than one loan is being converted each additional loan converted at the same time will attract a reduced fee of $250.

fees.name: Default Administration Fee
fees.additionalInfo: In default by an amount that is less than 2 repayments $20.00, otherwise $50.00.

fees.name: Default Notice Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when we send you a notice informing you of a default under this contract

fees.name: Discharge administration fee
fees.additionalInfo: A Discharge Administration fee is payable when you request us to close your loan account, or produce title deeds at settlement. If Greater Bank incurs any costs associated when doing this, the cost will also be passed on to you.

fees.name: Government charges
fees.additionalInfo: Charges will be variable, calculated if and when applicable. These charges include Withholding Tax, Registration Fees on security documents and Stamp Duty. For Contracts Regulated by the National Credit Code, the only fees and charges that are payable are those set out in that contract (as varied from time to time).

fees.name: Guarantee fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable for each guarantee provided

fees.name: Law stationers fee
fees.additionalInfo: Fee amount will be variable, calculated if and when applicable. Payable when a third party agent acts for or otherwise assists us in relation to (including when we request information in respect of a security or any other matter in connection with) your contract with us or a security.

fees.name: Legal fee
fees.additionalInfo: Fee amount will be variable, calculated if and when applicable. Payable when (or after) we make the amount of credit available to you for any costs and disbursements we have to pay a solicitor or conveyancer for acting for us in relation to this loan

fees.name: Mercantile agents fee
fees.additionalInfo: Fee amount will be variable, calculated if and when applicable. Payable when we instruct a mercantile agent to contact you on our behalf in relation to this loan or a security.

fees.name: Mortgage insurance premium fee
fees.additionalInfo: Fee amount will be variable, calculated if and when applicable. The amount charged by our mortgage insurer for a lenders mortgage insurance policy.

fees.name: Prepayment fee
fees.additionalInfo: The prepayment fee is charged if we estimate we will make an economic loss as a result of extra repayments during a fixed rate term.

fees.name: Registration fee
fees.additionalInfo: Fee amount will be variable, calculated if and when applicable. Payable when we register any documents in relation to a security.

fees.name: Property Exchange Australia (PEXA) transaction fee
fees.additionalInfo: Fee amount will be variable, calculated if and when applicable. Payable when we have to register any documents in relation to a security using PEXA, request information using PEXA, or we process a financial settlement using PEXA. Fees are applied as charged by PEXA

fees.name: Security substitution fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you ask us to substitute a security

fees.name: Settlement processing fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable for costs we incur in arranging settlement of the loan

fees.name: Title insurance premium
fees.additionalInfo: Fee amount will be variable, calculated if and when applicable. The amount charged by our title insurer for a lenders title insurance policy.
